Here you can find useful information to set up and run your first application with SuperGRID: Using SuperGRID.pdf.

A little example of a renderized SuperGRID control:

For some directions about how to get the values filled by the user, see Getting values back

Developed for creating even richer web applications, this control is being built to be the richer and powerfull one. Some of its features are:

- Client-side support for adding and deleting rows with no postback;
- Databound support and support for working without databinding;
- Table formatting similar to the DataGrid/Dataview formatting.

This is just the beginning and I pushed hard and will push even more hard to make this control good enough, see ya!@!

Chilá!@!
